wikipedia_page.main: Cordelia Bugeja (born 5 March 1976 in Chichester, West Sussex) is a British actress, best known for her roles as Melanie Hart in the soap opera Family Affairs, and the sex worker Kate in Respectable on Five.

response: The serial originally focused on the Hart and Gates family and some of their friends and close associates living in the fictional outer London suburb of Charnham. The Hart family consisted of parents builder  Chris (Ian Ashpitel), his wife Annie (Liz Crowther) and their four children: ladies' man Duncan (Rocky Marshall), confused 24-year-old virgin and trainee solicitor Holly (Sandra Huggett), police constable Melanie (Cordelia Bugeja), and schoolboy Jamie (Michael Cole).
Melanie Hart was played by Cordelia Bugeja. She is a police constable and the first of the Hart children to leave the family home.

Conjugal Rites was adapted as a situation comedy for ITV made by Granada Television which ran to 13 episodes over two series in 1993 and 1994. The lead roles were taken by Gwen Taylor and Michael Williams. Though they are only referred to, but not seen, in the stage play, the couple's son and daughter appear in the sitcom: Phillip Stephen Moyer and Gillian Cordelia Bugeja. Conjugal Rites
* Cordelia Bugeja (Series 1-2) as Jane, Jo Joyner recast as Jayne (Series 6)
* Cordelia Bugeja - British actress, best known for her roles as Melanie Hart in the soap opera Family Affairs
